mapper.select: SELECT count(1) AS recordsTotal FROM bb_room_prices INNER JOIN bb_room_prices_ref ON bb_room_prices_ref.price_id = bb_room_prices.id INNER JOIN bb_rooms ON bb_rooms.id = bb_room_prices_ref.room_id WHERE bb_rooms.project_id = #{staff.projectId}

SELECT bb_room_prices.*, GROUP_CONCAT(bb_rooms.name) AS room_name FROM bb_room_prices INNER JOIN bb_room_prices_ref ON bb_room_prices_ref.price_id = bb_room_prices.id INNER JOIN bb_rooms ON bb_room_prices_ref.room_id = bb_rooms.id WHERE bb_rooms.project_id = #{staff.projectId} GROUP BY bb_room_prices.id ORDER BY bb_room_prices.id DESC LIMIT #{start},#{length}

select * FROM bb_room_prices LEFT JOIN bb_room_prices_ref ON bb_room_prices.id = bb_room_prices_ref.price_id WHERE bb_room_prices_ref.room_id = #{room} AND #{date} BETWEEN bb_room_prices.start_date AND bb_room_prices.end_date
mapper.insert: insert into bb_room_prices (rental, start_date, end_date, start_time, end_time, wday, price) values (#{rental,typeHandler=com.ace.dao.handler.EnumHandler}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{wday,typeHandler=com.ace.dao.handler.WeekListTypeHandler}, #{price})
mapper.select: SELECT bb_room_prices.*, GROUP_CONCAT(bb_rooms.id) AS room_id, GROUP_CONCAT(bb_rooms.name) AS room_name FROM bb_room_prices INNER JOIN bb_room_prices_ref ON bb_room_prices_ref.price_id = bb_room_prices.id INNER JOIN bb_rooms ON bb_room_prices_ref.room_id = bb_rooms.id WHERE bb_room_prices.id = #{id} GROUP BY bb_room_prices.id limit 1
mapper.update: update bb_room_prices set rental = #{rental,typeHandler=com.ace.dao.handler.EnumHandler}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, wday = #{wday,typeHandler=com.ace.dao.handler.EnumHandler}, price = #{price} where id = #{id}
